title: I Want To Make the School’s “Silent Princess” Talk, so I Invited Her (Who’s Super Cute) Out on a Date Today. ~Anyways, She’s So Very Intense When It Comes to Skinship, That It’s Going To Take My Reason Away~ - Novel Updates
tags: Average-looking Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Kuudere   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   R-15
author: Topazonesu   とぱぞねす
description:
In this school, there was a princess. Aikawa Mio was an idol at the school and was also known as the 'Silent Princess' because she never opens her mouth no matter who talks to her. At the time, I didn't have many friends at school, and I was always in the background of my class. On one rainy day, however, the Silent Princess offered me a helping hand...

'Do you like dogs, Aikawa-san?'

'Mhn.'

——

'Wanna eat together?'

'...mhn!'

This is a coming-of-age love story about a school idol who never opens her mouth and a dull man who's always in the background of his class.
>
